document_data.mainbody:
lvaryl was a vampire member of Bodhis coven in Athkatla, active circa 1369 DR.
In the , assassins of the Shadow Thieves guild attacked the archmage Jon Irenicuss dungeon underneath Athkatla. The archmages vampire allies helped to release the assault. Ulvaryl was among the members of the coven that fought against the Shadow Thieves. She came face to face with Abdel Adrian as he was fleeing from the mages dungeon. Ulvaryl survived the encounter but taking on her bat or gaseous form.
